courseleaf.text:
Overview

There is no undergraduate premed degree program at UC Berkeley, although many Berkeley students enroll in classes to prepare themselves for careers in the health professions, including premed. For information about how to prepare for medical school as a Berkeley undergraduate, please visit Berkeleyâ€™s Career Center Medical School webpage . In addition, pre-health advising may be available in advising offices and academic departments affiliated with specific schools and colleges. For information, please visit the individual schools and colleges websites.
